items.sentence: Tom and Mary told everybody that they\'d gotten divorced.
There are many things that I don\'t understand very well.
Do you think you can handle a few minutes alone with Tom?
English is spoken by more people than any other language.
Almost all of Tom\'s free time is spent on a golf course.
Tom can\'t seem to understand what Mary is trying to say.
Tom certainly didn\'t deserve the punishment he received.
Tom couldn\'t have done anything to prevent the accident.
Tom uncorked a bottle of wine and poured himself a glass.
Tom waited a long time for Mary, but she never showed up.
Tom walked out of the courtroom, surrounded by reporters.
Tom seems to be able to sense when someone is in trouble.
I thought that Tom said that he liked this kind of music.
Tom doesn\'t know the difference between right and wrong.
Tom doesn\'t know who Mary is going to go to Boston with.
Tom doesn\'t like to be kissed by women wearing lipstick.
Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary had made that decision.
Tom says that he\'ll study French with Mary this evening.
Change into some old clothes before you clean the garage.
Everyone should get out of here before someone gets hurt.
